thread.title: Scott King
thread.title_full: Ingram's Water & Air Equipment reviewed by Scott King

author: Scott King
title: Scott King
text: Jerry W was extremely knowledgeable and a pleasure to deal with. The shipper(ABF Freight) keeps them from getting a five. All units refused for damage today. Ingrams jumped right on it and is reordering units. Thanks Jerry and staff
